item.title: I have a blog now!
item.author: Author
item.description: Hello, Blog! After a whole weekend, finally, it's live now! I'm adding a quick first blog! This site was powered by Hugo with theme LoveIt. I set it up by following a Hugo tutorial session on Youtube. The most time-consuming and challenging part is customizing, which required some understanding of each element/folder and knowledge of html and css (thanks to the Web Design course I took the last semester).
